message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1,300,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product,  $1,300,000 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,275,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for this incredible product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $1,225,000.  This is a serious offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Bob, I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $1,250,000, which is my previous best offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
